candidates.body:
Bump version to `0.19.0` in preparation for a release using `libbpf-sys` `1.0`.

Let me know if we should postpone for other features to be included.

candidates.title: Update to libbpf-sys v1.0.0
candidates.body:
v1!

libbpf-sys release tag: [v1.0.0](https://github.com/libbpf/libbpf-sys/releases/tag/1.0.0%2Bv1.0.0)

Outside of updating the dependency, other changes:

* libbpf-rs: Remove use of deprecated bpf_object_open_opts fields [0]

* libbpf-cargo: Remove use of deprecated bpf_map__def call [1]

[0] https://github.com/libbpf/libbpf/commit/d8454ba8ad83514a5afc6e3d05bddb61f299d5f4#diff-ecec02d2345e3666818b41e879a7e9242acbd0575f20f796b2d8b7fe0cf2841bL127
[1] https://github.com/libbpf/libbpf/commit/d8454ba8ad83514a5afc6e3d05bddb61f299d5f4#diff-ac82747bd450e8e5e0805a99d6c24afa9fcbfcddffbce5aa3288b2edabe17419L9776

Signed-off-by: Milan Landaverde <milan@mdaverde.com>

candidates.title: libbpf-cargo: update regex to 0.16.0 to mitigate DoS vulnerabilities
candidates.body:
As described in
https://github.com/libbpf/libbpf-rs/security/dependabot/1, there are DoS
vulnerabilities associated with regex version 1.5

This commit updates the regex version to 1.6.0

Signed-off-by: Joanne Koong <joannekoong@gmail.com>

candidates.title: libbpf-rs: remove deprecated bpf_map__def() usage
candidates.body:
bpf_map__def() is deprecated since libbpf-0.8.
This commit changes the code to use the appropriate getters/setters
instead.

Signed-off-by: Joanne Koong <joannekoong@gmail.com>

candidates.title: Release libbpf-rs 0.17.0 and libbpf-cargo 0.12.0
candidates.body:
These commits bump libbpf-rs to 0.17.0, libbpf-cargo to 0.12.0, and updates the readme to reflect these new versions

Signed-off-by: Joanne Koong <joannekoong@gmail.com>

candidates.title: Expose libbpf-sys' static feature
candidates.body:
To statically link elfutils and libz. Tested on [rbperf](https://github.com/javierhonduco/rbperf) compiled with `RUSTFLAGS="-L /usr/lib -L /usr/lib64" cargo b`

**With the feature disabled (the default)**

```
[javierhonduco@fedora rbperf]$ ldd target/debug/rbperf
        linux-vdso.so.1 (0x00007fffa8de3000)
        libelf.so.1 => /lib/libelf.so.1 (0x00007ff9a5727000)
        libz.so.1 => /lib64/libz.so.1 (0x00007ff9a570d000)
        libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007ff9a56ed000)
        libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007ff9a560f000)
        libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007ff9a540e000)
        /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007ff9a5fa2000)
```

**With the static feature**
```
[javierhonduco@fedora rbperf]$ ldd target/debug/rbperf
        linux-vdso.so.1 (0x00007ffc5ed6a000)
        libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007ff391800000)
        libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007ff391722000)
        libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007ff391521000)
        /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007ff392098000)
```

candidates.title: Minor updates for libbpf-rs
candidates.body:
* Update libbpf-sys to v0.8.0
* Replace deprecated libbpf APIs
* Add Btf::get_kind for libbpf-cargo
* Add support for BTF_KIND_TYPE_TAG

candidates.title: libbpf-cargo: use clap derive
candidates.body:
As stated in the [docs](https://github.com/TeXitoi/structopt/blob/master/README.md#maintenance): structopt is now in maintenance mode.

This PR migrates to use the new [clap derive](https://github.com/clap-rs/clap/tree/master/clap_derive) functionality that has an almost identical interface.
I have updated and compiled all of the examples to ensure they are still working as expected.

Signed-off-by: Dan Bond <danbond@protonmail.com>

candidates.title: libbpf-rs: update libbpf-sys dependency
candidates.body:
libbpf-sys 0.7.1 includes a newer libbpf version that has many useful features including the new
BPF_KPROBE_SYSCALL macro. Let's update so that users that are using a vendored libbpf can
take advantage of these features.

candidates.title: libbpf-rs: Add functionality for the libbpf TC interface
candidates.body:
Documentation of the libbpf TC interface can be found here
https://lwn.net/ml/bpf/20210512103451.989420-3-memxor@gmail.com/

Signed-off-by: Michael Mullin <mimullin@blackberry.com>

chosen_pr.title: libbpf-cargo: update regex to 0.16.0 to mitigate DoS vulnerabilities
chosen_pr.body:
As described in
https://github.com/libbpf/libbpf-rs/security/dependabot/1, there are DoS
vulnerabilities associated with regex version 1.5

This commit updates the regex version to 1.6.0

Signed-off-by: Joanne Koong <joannekoong@gmail.com>

This commit updates the regex version to 1.6.0
